_comment_mining: Number of CPU threads - RPi5 has 4 cores. Use 2 for low power/24-7 operation, 4 for maximum performance
_comment_priority: Process priority (0-20, higher = lower priority). Use 19 for 24/7 operation (lowest priority), 0 for maximum performance
_comment_bitcoind: These will be overridden by .env values (BITCOIN_RPC_USER and BITCOIN_RPC_PASSWORD)
_comment_coinbase: Mining address and message. Address will be overridden by .env BITCOIN_MINING_ADDRESS
_comment_monitoring: Temperature thresholds in Celsius for warnings and critical alerts
_comment_telegram: Telegram notifications interval in minutes (30 = every 30 minutes). Set to 0 to disable
